entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning early this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
